properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Eclipse Integration
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

subsection.name: CTE
subsection.p: BugLabs have contributed a full Eclipse integration for Concierge. With the Concierge Tools for Eclipse (CTE), developers can write their (R3) bundles in Eclipse and run or debug them directly inside the IDE.

The Concierge Tools for Eclipse can be installed via the update site:
http://concierge.sourceforge.net/cte/update

p.i: Create new Concierge projects with the project wizard.
Run Concierge applications directly in Eclipse.
